csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" xml:lang="en">
  <citation>
    <layout prefix="(" suffix=")" delimiter="; ">
      <group delimiter=" ">
        <names variable="author">
          <name/>
          <substitute>
            <text variable="title"/>
          </substitute>
        </names>
        <date variable="issued">
          <date-part name="year"/>
        </date>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>

input.abstract: An interesting book by an interesting author.
input.title: Book A

input.abstract: An old contribution to a new field.
input.title: Book B
